data.name: Anarchy in Japan[ty]
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8699-OASD-1871">Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

MIZUKI is infertile. Desperate for a child, she kidnaps a baby boy from the car of a couple who are screwing outside. Mizuki raises the boy and names him YOSHIKI. Eight years later, Mizuko falls in love with a loser named TATSUTOSHI and together they start a dysfunctional family that doesn’t follow any rules, except their own! A pitch black comedy with a punk attitude, Anarchy in [Ja]Panty is Berlin International Film Festival FIPRESCI Prize winner, director Takahisa Zeze’s Pink Eiga masterpiece!

Eight years later, Mizuko falls in love with a loser named TATSUTOSHI and together they start a dysfunctional family that doesn’t follow any rules, except their own! A pitch black comedy with a punk attitude, Anarchy in [Ja]Panty is Berlin International Film Festival  FIPRESCI Prize winner, director Takahisa Zeze’s Pink Eiga masterpiece!
data.short_description: MIZUKI is infertile. Desperate for a child, she kidnaps a baby boy from the car of a couple who are screwing outside. Mizuki raises the boy and names him YOSHIKI. Eight years later, Mizuko falls in love with a loser named TATSUTOSHI and together they start a dysfunctional family that doesn’t follow any rules, except their own!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

Minimum:

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING: Contains mature language, simulated adult situations and graphic nudity. This film is for discerning adults of legal age only. Not suitable for minors. Viewer discretion is advised. Please check your country's local laws before purchasing or renting this film.
